'''Automatically Generated Legislative Actions'''


'''[[2015-2016 SB32 (USA CA)|SB 32]] California Global Warming Solutions Act of 2006: emissions limit.'''

Jerry was a cosponsor of SB 32.

Final legislative action 2016-08-24 passed yeas 25, nays 13. 
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Do pass as amended, but first amend, and re-refer to the Committee on [Appropriations]).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Placed on suspense file).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Do pass).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of 3rd Reading ).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Unfinished Business (Supplemental File 1) SB32 Pavley Concurrence).

'''[[2015-2016 SB350 (USA CA)|SB 350]] Clean Energy and Pollution Reduction Act of 2015.'''

Final legislative action 2015-09-11 passed yeas 26, nays 14. 
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Do pass, but first be re-referred to the Committee on [Environmental Quality]).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Do pass, but first be re-referred to the Committee on [Appropriations]).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Placed on suspense file).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Do pass).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of 3rd Reading SB350 De Le贸n).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Unfinished Business (Supplemental File 6) SB350 De Le贸n Concurrence).

'''[[2015-2016 SB1383 (USA CA)|SB 1383]] Short-lived climate pollutants: methane emissions: dairy and livestock: organic waste: landfills.'''

Jerry was a cosponsor of SB 1383.

Final legislative action 2016-08-31 passed yeas 25, nays 12. 
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Do pass as amended, but first amend, and re-refer to the Committee on [Appropriations]).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Placed on suspense file).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Do pass).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of 3rd Reading ).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of That the Assembly amendments be concurred in).
:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of W/O REF. TO FILE ).

Final legislative action 2016-08-24 passed yeas 45, nays 30.

:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of 2nd Reading AB197 Eduardo Garcia By Pavley).

'''[[2015-2016 AB2722 (USA CA)|AB 2722]] Transformative Climate Communities Program.'''

:*Jerry voted yea (in favor of Placed on suspense file).
